title: [BUG] Memory leak at SKRoundRect#Transform?

comments.author: ngocdaothanh
comments.body:
Looking at the new code:
https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/pull/995/files

I think the memory leak hasn't been fixed, because there's no call to `sk_rrect_delete`.

When `sk_rrect_transform` returns `false`, `destHandle` is still not released.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Oh no. I think something got lost in a merge. Let me fix that.
